turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a coffee to pick up at Peets.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course. Which location would you like to go to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Broadway in Oakland.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Right. That's 1111 Broadway.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: When you're ready, please let me know what you'd like to order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like an iced caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good. And what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Medium, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Very good. Would you like some diary added to that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Do they have half and half?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No, I'm afraid not.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have soy or almond?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, they have both.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good. In that case I'll take almond. But no other flavors or sugar. I'm trying to cut down.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All right. So we have a medium iced caramel macchiato with almond milk to be picked up at the Peet's location at 1111 Broadway.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else I can help with now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all for now. Thanks. Good bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. The receipt is being texted to your device now and the coffee should be waiting for you when you arrive.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thanks again.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Certainly. Have a good rest of the day.
